title: Awakening
description: Forget everything you ever thought to be true about our world. Angels are real. And they are fighting for control over the human race.  What would you do if you learned everything you knew about the world was wrong? Microbiology student Elena Michaels is about to find out. After a few chance encounters with Alexavier Edmunds, a strange but intriguing student on campus, Elena is on the run from an ancient organization of angel-like beings. Strange things are awakening within her, and there is only one with the answersâ€”the Elder. But can she make it to him in time?
author: Scott Wieczorek
